fields.title: Grilled Cheese
fields.instructions: 1. Butter two slices of bread. 2. Place cheese between slices. 3. Grill until golden brown.

fields.title: Caesar Salad
fields.instructions: 1. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. 2. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
fields.ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, Croutons, Parmesan cheese

fields.title: Tomato Soup
fields.instructions: 1. Heat tomato soup in a saucepan. 2. Serve hot with a side of bread.

fields.title: Avocado Toast
fields.instructions: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado and spread on toast. 3. Add salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
fields.ingredients: Bread, Avocado, Salt, Pepper, Lemon juice

fields.title: Microwave Mac & Cheese
fields.description: Quick and easy microwave mac & cheese.
fields.instructions: 1. Combine macaroni and water in a bowl. 2. Microwave until tender. 3. Stir in cheese.

fields.title: Fruit Smoothie
fields.instructions: 1. Blend fruits with yogurt and honey. 2. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Quesadilla
fields.instructions: 1. Place cheese between tortillas. 2. Heat in a pan until cheese melts.

fields.title: Instant Oatmeal
fields.instructions: 1. Mix oatmeal with hot water. 2. Add toppings of choice.

fields.title: Pita Pizza
fields.instructions: 1. Spread sauce on pita. 2. Add toppings and cheese. 3. Bake until cheese melts.
fields.ingredients: Pita bread, Pizza sauce, Toppings, Cheese

fields.title: Scrambled Eggs
fields.instructions: 1. Beat eggs. 2. Cook in a pan over medium heat, stirring constantly.

fields.title: Veggie Wrap
fields.instructions: 1. Fill tortilla with veggies and dressing. 2. Roll up and serve.

fields.title: Yogurt Parfait
fields.instructions: 1. Layer yogurt, granola, and fruit in a cup.

fields.title: Chicken Salad
fields.instructions: 1. Mix cooked chicken with mayo and celery. 2. Serve on lettuce or bread.
fields.ingredients: Cooked chicken, Mayo, Celery, Lettuce or Bread

fields.title: Tuna Salad
fields.instructions: 1. Mix tuna with mayo and relish. 2. Serve on lettuce or bread.
fields.ingredients: Tuna, Mayo, Relish, Lettuce or Bread
